title: Apocalyptic Survival - Audio Pack
description: 100+ High Quality Audio Files for your Survival Game
longDescription:
Hi There!


In this pack i create sounds i think can come in hand when we talking about survival games, like pick a lock to open a house, attack with white weapons, craft, tailor, cooking, fishing, and others!


Here's the list:


1. Axe Attack 01

2. Baseball Bat 01

3. Being Attacked 01

4. Box Crash 01

5. Break Down The Door 01

6. ChainSaw 01

7. Cooking 01

8. Crafting 01

9. Drop 01

10. Eating 01

11. Fishing

12. Gore 01

13. Guitar Attack 01

14. Hammer 01

15. Harvest 01

16. Heal 01

17. House Alarm 01

18. Knife Attack 01

19. Lighting Up 01

20. Metal Bar 01

21. Object Drop 01

22. Opening Window 01

23. Pick a Lock 01

24. Pick Up Object 01

25. Pipe Attack 01

26. Punch 01

27. Rock Attack 01

28. Safe Sound 01

29. Scream 01

30. Scythe 01

31. Pistol01

32. Tailoring 01

33. Trigger Action 01

34. Wood Attack 01
